name: SharpMemory
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sharp memory
Developer Terms of Use
des: Welcome to the sharp memory game !!! A very fun skill to improve your memory and attention. The objective of the game is to correctly inform the word requested by Alexa when it presents a list of ordered words, that is, Alexa will list a series of words and then ask you to answer which word in a certain order. For example, it can list the following colors: blue, yellow, green and white and ask for the third color mentioned. When answering green you will score and the degree of difficulty will gradually increase, when you miss the color you will not increase your score but you can continue playing until you reach high levels of difficulty.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
